Module main
Package com.vtuberrush.src.managers

Class ProjectileManager

java.lang.Object
com.vtuberrush.src.managers.ProjectileManager
public class ProjectileManager extends Object
Facilitates the rendering, adding, and removing of projectiles in the playing field.
Version:
0.0.1-alpha.1
Author:
Gio Carlo Ciudadano

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ProjectileManager.Explosion
    A unique, stationary projectile effect created by Elira when her original projectiles collide with an enemy.
    An explosion contains information related to its position, current lifetime and own animation index.

    Initializes the sprites and animations of projectiles.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addProjectile​(Unit unit, Enemy enemy)
    Checks whether the unit is within range of an enemy, and creates a projectile in the direction of the enemy if true.
    Calculates the velocity and rotation of the projectile being fired.
    void
    draw​(Graphics graphics)
    Renders the image of all projectiles based on their velocity, rotation, and type.
    void
    resetGame()
    Removes all projectiles and explosions on the playing field.
    void
    tick()
    Updates the position and animation of all projectiles and detects if a projectile collides with an enemy.
    Creates an explosion in the collision if the projectile was fired by Elira.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectileManager

      public ProjectileManager​(Playing playing)
      Initializes the sprites and animations of projectiles. Created when initializing the PLAYING game state.
      Parameters:
      playing - - Defines the specific instance of the scene where the wave manager is initialized.
      See Also:
      loadProjectiles()

  • Method Details

    • addProjectile

      public void addProjectile​(Unit unit, Enemy enemy)
      Checks whether the unit is within range of an enemy, and creates a projectile in the direction of the enemy if true.
      Calculates the velocity and rotation of the projectile being fired.

      Parameters:
      unit - - The unit creating the projectile. Defines the projectile type.
      enemy - - The enemy being fired at by the projectile.

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Updates the position and animation of all projectiles and detects if a projectile collides with an enemy.
      Creates an explosion in the collision if the projectile was fired by Elira.

    • draw

      public void draw​(Graphics graphics)
      Renders the image of all projectiles based on their velocity, rotation, and type.
      Parameters:
      graphics - - Responsible for drawing objects to the screen.

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame()
      Removes all projectiles and explosions on the playing field.
      Called during a game over or game complete condition.
